banner.message: My name is Wilmer Andres Soto Almeida, and I'm a Full Stack Developer

about.title: About Me
about.firstParagraph: In my life journey, I didn't have a clear idea of my professional direction until I discovered programming. I was captivated by the constant growth that this field offers.
about.secondParagraph: What excites me the most about web application development is the thrill of solving problems, the continuous process of acquiring new knowledge, and adhering to best practices to provide clients with an exceptional experience. While my primary focus is on the backend due to my affinity for data handling, I also enjoy working on the frontend, where I implement design patterns, optimize for SEO, and other related areas.

resumeItem.title: Software Analyst and Developer BTENDER
resumeItem.desc: Development, maintenance, and deployment of a web application for service quotations offered by the company BTENDER.

resumeItem.title: Software Analyst and Developer Gelvez Distribuciones SAS
resumeItem.desc: Development and implementation of a web application for the company's intranet, complex SQL queries on HANA database.

resumeItem.title: Full Stack Developer SoyHenry
resumeItem.desc: Virtual bootcamp at SoyHenry where I learned and strengthened technologies such as JavaScript, React, Redux, Node.js, Express.js, Sequelize, among others.

resumeItem.title: Software Analyst and Developer SENA
resumeItem.desc: Technological studies during which I gained knowledge in documentation, requirements gathering, negotiation, and technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, jQuery, PHP, JAVA, SQL.
